question: What is the theme of the 2017 National Technology Day (NTD) in India?
option1: Technologies for better quality of life
option2: Technology for inclusive and sustainable growth
answer: Technology for inclusive and sustainable growth
explanation: The National Technology Day (NTD) is celebrated every year on May 11 by the Union Ministry of Science & Technology to mark the historic feat of test-firing its very first nuclear-capable missile back in 1998 and to commemorate achievements of Innovation and Technology in India. The 2017 theme is “Technology for inclusive and sustainable growth”.
